评论详情: This is a cute top, though I'd say it was a tad on the smaller side. I kept the size cus it still fit enough.
super cute! the pink is not see through and fits me well. I love the lace, material, and how soft and stretchy it is.

The shirt was completely see through, and the body of the shirt is wide; arms are smaller than shown in pictures. The neckline is also pretty wide but the lace and color were accurate. Not worth the purchase.

It’s a cute layer to wear under a hoodie or long sleeve due to the lace neckline. It can also be worn alone with a white bra/ no bra if you are a fan of not having to see it under the white tshirt. Very adorable but does not hug the body tightly.

I bought this for my 14 yo niece.  When she opened it, it looked like something that would fit a cabbage patch doll (do they still make those or am I aging myself?). She tried it on and it stretched to fit.  Not sure if the quality and I would have bought her a bigger size but she liked it!

评论概述: Lace is really pretty I love the navy blue color
评论详情: I like the lace outline on the shirt but when I washed it for the first time it was weird when it came out a little weird things were sticking to it like loose threads but it is really cute on.
You will have to wear a bra unfortunately but it’s cute and flattering
Love this and its true to size and fits soo well
Soft bodysuit and thick enough for it not to see through
Bought for my teen and she loves it.

评论概述: A little see through but very cute!
评论详情: It’s very cute, but it is see through, make sure to wear a nude or white bra or tank top underneath!
